attributes.action: Make blood safe and pay compensation to haemphiliacs infected with HIV and HEP C
attributes.additional_details:
Haemophiliacs received tainted blood from prisoners in American prisons in the early 80's. Since then 1,000's of Haemophiliacs have died, children and adults.
The haemophiliacs(a rare bleeding disorder)have never received compensation or a public enquiry.

Protect you blood supplies and make them safe and help get justice for Haemophiliacs!
